title: Inkscapetober Day 22: Open
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Inkscapetober Day 22:** Open
**Author:** [[*user SleepOfReason]]
Check out more art [[[SleepOfReason creates art| here]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


[[=image SleepOfReason.png]]


**Subject:** SleepOfReason

**Commentary:** Yeah yeah, I know what you're thinking. I'm making art for myself and it's far more detailed than the rest. But there are reasons for that. Firstly, I have been working on this one for some time already, so it was easier do more with it in a short amount of time than with the other works. Secondly, I know myself better than all of my other subjects combined, obviously. That allows me to put more references in the work, even though their meaning is not immediately clear to the viewer.

**How the prompt fits in:** Not only is the visor of the helmet open, I'm also being somewhat open about myself. But then again, not too open of course.

@@ @@
